string.value: I heard the Helios Tower Library has been ruined. I need to go check it out...

Wiz the Librarian seemed very concerned about the mix-up of the storybook on Shim Chung, and he wished to get the story straight and find the storybook that actually does present the story in the right order.

Through the request from Wiz the Librarian, I have managed to straighten out the Story of Shim Chung and #p2071009#, and acquired the fixed storybook, afterwhich I headed back to Wiz and gave him the book.

Oh, no. The storybook of 'Shim Chung : A Good Daughter' has been affected by the cracked dimension caused in Ludibrium, and now the pages are totally out of whack. About now, something bad might have happened to #b#p2071009##k who resides in the Folk Town.

Unfortunately, I cannot leave this library right now. It's my duty to stay in the library and take care of the books. It's not something I can skip. If you are on your way to the Folk Town by any chance, then please straighten out the story of Shim Chung and give me the fixed #b'#t4031280#'#k for me.
If this library is not fixed soon, the numerous stories of the Folk Town will be jumbled up, and the whole town will be in a state of chaos.

You must have gotten the story straight. If you return this book to its exact spot in the library, the library will probably return to its peaceful state. Thank you so much for contributing to the Library Restoration project.
Please straighten up the story and bring me the fixed storybook.
